intro: Sphenodesme microstylis, commonly known as the slender-styled sphenodesme, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its small, delicate flowers arranged in umbellate inflorescences, typical of the carrot family. The plant features finely divided, fern-like leaves that are often aromatic. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, typically found in temperate regions. Sphenodesme microstylis is noted for its subtle appearance and ecological importance in supporting pollinators.
